reviewText: I love this Ispy video and the kids just can not get enough. We must watch one of our Ispy videos at least once a day.
I bought this for my 5 year old son. He loves I Spy! He loves the books & videos. And I love Spy too!!
My wife is teacher of Kindergarten here in Monterrey, Mexico... she plays this video for toddlers between 4 and 5 years... they love it...
